item.title: Adobe Premiere Pro
item.description: Reference: https://youtu.be/8gxRCn0lKWE?t=31 Today, I learned about Adobe Premiere Pro Plugins. This here, is a plugin that helps you zoom in and out for clips. Without using key frames. But what’s more interesting to me, is that there’s plugins in Adobe. I think I found an opportunity. Building Adobe Premiere Pro Plugin. Action Plan Learn tutorials Find repetitive work Create Plugins that’s easy to use Quick Research Adobe Premiere Pro Plugin uses C/C++ and HTML/JS for the User Panel
